text: I can't believe they're actually doing this. How do you even have a conversation with a single character? 😂
Well, that's the challenge, isn't it? It's like a throwback to the days of morse code or flag semaphore.
I guess it's a good way to save bandwidth... 1 character at a time. 🤣
I wonder what kind of abbreviations and codes we'll develop to communicate in such limited format. This might actually be interesting.
We'll probably start to see a whole new language emerge. Emoji Morse code, anyone? 😜
It would be like Twitter hieroglyphics! Can't wait to decipher the tweets of the future.
THIS IS THE BEST IDEA EVER. FINALLY, NO MORE LONG TWEETS TO READ. 😎
I'm not sure if you're being sarcastic or not, but I'm actually excited to see how people get creative with this.
I can already see the memes and cryptic tweets. It's like a whole new Twitterverse!
I give it a week before someone finds a way to bypass the limit and post full-length tweets again. 😅
You might be right, but it would be amusing to see how long this experiment lasts.
At least it will give us a break from the endless political arguments!
